ygData.subject: Re: Been there done that, Flameless Lantern
ygData.msgSnippet: WOOHOO, I m Really excited to here some people are successfully tinkering.  I ve just reached level 9 myself, and finished buying all the 3rd circle spells
ygData.messageBody:
WOOHOO,


I'm Really excited to here some people are successfully tinkering. I've just
reached level 9 myself, and finished buying all the 3rd circle spells that I
need. Tinkering is now my next goal. I have a few questions though. At what
level will your tinkering skills improve. I haven't been back to my homeland
in a while and I was wondering how much the toolkit and the first book cost.

Malkin
Gnomish Wizard and soon to be seller of infravision goggles.




David Nelson wrote:

> From: David Nelson <DNelson@...>
>
> Same here.. made the Flameless Lantern last night myself. Glad to finally
> see something happen with tinkering!
>
> -Emerical
> Solusek Ro
>
>
> From: rjones@...
>
> Ok, so after the solution for Firewater was given
> to me, I tried Tinkering the stuff, simple. Worked
> every time. Then I tried the only item that I could afford and tada, the
> first(in the game I think) Flameless Lantern (gave it away) then two
> failures. But all in all I made 3. They seem to be
> at least as bright as Lightstone, possibly brighter, but being a Gnome, what
> do I need it for? :) But it's been done. Tinkering works.
> Going to put in my order for Pie Tins and start
> making Compasses. And as soon as I find a tattered
> cloak, it's Thermal Cloak time. Man I need more money.
>
> -Zikkin
>
